TextJPN: 「ちょ、…ええっ？@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3087.　暁も陸央大にしたのぉ？！」
TextENG: ``Wait... huh?@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3087. You're going to Rikuo University too, Akira?!``

TextJPN: 「あ、ああ…。@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3013.なんか、まずかったか？」
TextENG: ``Y-yeah...@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3013. What, is that bad?``

TextJPN: 「いや、まずくはないけどさ…」
TextENG: ``No, there's nothing wrong with it, but...``

TextJPN: 確か、陸央大の芸術学部はまだできて歴史も浅かったはず。
TextENG: Certainly, Rikuo University had a recently established art department, but it didn't have much history to it.

TextJPN: それに教官もたいした面子が揃っていないため、志望するのはよほどの物好きか、技量的にいまひとつの一軍半だと聞いていた。
TextENG: Also, the instructors didn't have a lot name recognition, so I heard only those who were really curious or less skilled aimed for it.

TextJPN: 「あんたの腕と実績なら、東京の美大だって引く手あまたでしょ？@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3090.　今の高校みたいに、奨学金とか特待生待遇とか…」
TextENG: ``With your skills and achievements, couldn't you get into the Tokyo College of the Arts?@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3090. With all those honors and special scholarships like you've gotten at this school...``

TextJPN: 「いい先生もそっちの方が多いし、名を売る機会も環境も格段の違いなのに、なんでそっちにしなかったのさ？」
TextENG: ``There are also a lot of great teachers there, and it would be a much better environment to get your name out there, so why not go that route?``

TextJPN: 「別に、名前を売るために絵を描いてるわけじゃないしさ。@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3015.それに…」
TextENG: ``I'm not really interested in drawing pictures to get my name out there.@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3015. Plus...``

TextJPN: 「それに？」
TextENG: ``Plus?``

TextJPN: 「……。@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3017.い、いや、なんでもねぇよ」
TextENG: ``......@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3017. N-no, it's nothing.``

TextJPN: 慌ててたいした理由でもないように口をつぐんだが、…真っ赤になった顔を見れば、すぐにわかる。
TextENG: He quickly shut his mouth to avoid answering... but once I saw how red his face was turning, I figured it out.

TextJPN: そういえば、…最近知ったんだけど陸央大は、あの子の志望する三咲大と姉妹校だった。そのため一般教養の授業ではいくつか、合同で行われているものもあると聞く。
TextENG: Come to think of it... I recently learned that the school that girl was aspiring to, Misaki University, was a sister school of Rikuo University. And as part of that relationship, I hear that some of their general education classes are conducted together.

TextJPN: 当然そうなれば、顔を合わせる機会も増えるというやつで…。
TextENG: So naturally, that would increase their opportunities to see each other face to face...

TextJPN: 「しっかしまぁ、あんたもベタぼれだねぇ。@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3094.いくら告白したてで不安だからって、自分の将来まで相手の都合で決めなくてもいいんじゃない？」
TextENG: ``Well now, it sounds like you've really fallen in love.@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3094. I know you've only just confessed and you're still nervous, but you don't have to let her circumstances dictate your future, right?``

TextJPN: 「なっ？！@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3019.　べ、別に俺は、公由のことで大学を決めたわけじゃっ！！」
TextENG: ``Wha?!@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3019. Th-that's not it. The college I picked has nothing to do with Kimiyoshi!!``

TextJPN: 「ん？@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3096.　私ゃ一言も夏美のことは言ってなかったんだけど～？」
TextENG: ``Hmm?@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3096. But I didn't say anything about Natsumi, did I~?``

TextJPN: 暁くん、自爆。単純なやつだねぇ～！
TextENG: Way to shoot yourself in the foot, Akira-kun. What a simple-minded guy~!

TextJPN: 「あ、でも…」
ふと気付く。このことを夏美が知ったら、どう思うだろうか。
TextENG: A thought suddenly came to me. If Natsumi knew about this, what would she think?

TextJPN: 別に私は、暁が行くから陸央大を選んだわけじゃない。むしろ逆だし、同じ大学と言っても芸術学部と薬学部じゃ、もはや別の学校と言ってもいいくらいに離れている。
TextENG: Akira's choice to enroll at Rikuo University didn't have much impact on my decision. Rather, it was the other way around. And even if we're in the same university, the department of arts and the pharmacology department are essentially completely different schools.

TextJPN: だけど、…私は以前、夏美に『陸央大はやめとけ』って言っちゃったのだ。
TextENG: But... I advised Natsumi to ``set Rikuo University aside.``

TextJPN: それは、あの子の今の成績だと明らかにきつかったし、私みたく浪人覚悟で受けるほどに家の人も理解はないと聞いていたからなんだけど…。
TextENG: It was obviously a poor choice given her current grades. And unlike my family, I heard that her family wouldn't allow her to aim for any universities except the ones where she could pass the entrance exams on the first try...

TextJPN: 「ね、暁」
TextENG: ``Hey, Akira.``

TextJPN: 「なんだ？」
TextENG: ``What's up?``

TextJPN: 「そのさ、…暁が陸央大に行くって決めたこと、夏美には話した？」
TextENG: ``Well... have you told Natsumi yet that you're planning to go to Rikuo University?``

TextJPN: 「いや、まだだけど…それが？」
TextENG: ``No, not yet... Is that a problem?``

TextJPN: 「うん。…ちょっとさ、事情があって。@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3101.あの子にはそのこと、まだ黙っててくれるかな？」
TextENG: ``Yeah. ...There might be a slight issue.@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3101. Could you keep this quiet from her for now?``

TextJPN: 意味がわからず暁は最初きょとんとしていたが、私の説明を聞いてからは納得してくれた。
TextENG: Akira didn't understand what I was getting at at first and stared blankly. But after hearing my explanation, he seemed convinced.

TextJPN: 暁としても、変な誤解を持たれたりするのは不本意ということだろう。
TextENG: Akira didn't want there to be any strange misunderstandings either.

TextJPN: 「わかったよ。しばらく黙っておく。@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3025.…でも、なんだか隠し事してるみたいで、いい気分じゃないよな」
TextENG: ``Understood. I'll keep it quiet for a while.@k@vS20/39/VTT_akira3025. ...But it seems like I'm hiding something, and I don't feel good about that.``

TextJPN: 「おぅおぅ、えらく真面目だねぇ。@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3103.今からそんなんじゃ、浮気したときに一発でばれるよ～？」
TextENG: ``Oh my, so serious.@k@vS20/37/VTT_chisa3103. With an attitude like that, she'd find out instantly if you ever cheated on her~.``

TextJPN: 「う、浮気なんてするかよっ！！」
TextENG: ``I-I'd never cheat on her!!``

TextJPN: 「あっはっはっはっ！！」
TextENG: ``Aa ha ha ha!!``

TextJPN: とりあえず、夏美には時機を見て話してみるか。三咲大と陸央大が、姉妹校だってことを強調して。
TextENG: Anyway, we'll try talking to Natsumi about it when the time is right. And we'll emphasize the fact that Misaki and Rikuo are sister schools.

TextJPN: 別に、やましい気持ちはこれっぽっちもないんだし、ストレートにちゃんと話せば夏美だって、きっと――。
TextENG: There's nothing to feel guilty about here. Once we explain everything properly, surely Natsumi will...

TextJPN: 本当に、…そうか？
TextENG: But... is that really how it will play out?
